description:
The attorneys at the Morrison & Hughes Law Firm provide unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout the greater Atlanta metro and surrounding areas who suffered a serious injury on the job or as the result of an accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Based in Marietta, our law firm has grown to include four offices, and we promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek for any of the following:

  • Personal injury, including car and truck accidents and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation and Social Security Disability
  • Wage and overtime disputes

Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, our attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently while also improving the likelihood you will recover the full amount of compensation you deserve. To date, we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, and you can rely on us for aggressive advocacy at all turns.

Utilizing the latest in legal technology, we are able to devise the most compelling case possible on your behalf. What's more, two of our attorneys are AV Preeminent peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell, and we have earned many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers for our impeccable professionalism and exceptional legal abilities. At the same time, we have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as the Platinum Client Champion Award from Martindale-Hubbell.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation possible directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart. To begin the process, you can schedule a free case evaluation by contacting the Morrison & Hughes Law Firm. We also offer virtual consultations in an attempt to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
